label: datacenter.fyi – Oncor area large-load projects
notes: Third-party aggregation of data-center / large-load queue projects in the Oncor service territory. Information may be stale, incomplete, or incorrectly attributed. Use only as a screening lead; do NOT use as evidence in published rules.

label: datacenter.fyi – All ERCOT large-load projects
notes: Third-party aggregation of ERCOT large-load projects across all TDSP areas. Same caveats as oncor-specific view.

label: ERCOT Large Load Integration landing page
notes: ERCOT's official Large Load Integration page – primary source for current Q&A PDF links, process overview, and announcements. Snapshot periodically to detect Q&A version updates.

label: ERCOT Calendar – Batch Study Process Workshops
notes: ERCOT calendar events for Batch Study Process workshops. Snapshot before/after each workshop to capture event details and any linked materials.

label: Texas Tribune – ERCOT data center / large load reporting
notes: News reporting on ERCOT's new framework for data center/large load demand. Useful as background context for memo narrative. Higher confidence than pure commercial sites because Texas Tribune is a credible news outlet, but still non-authoritative for regulatory facts.
